channel.title: math.GN updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.GN updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: Structure spaces and allied problems on a class of rings of measurable functions
item.description: arXiv:2408.00505v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: A ring $S(X,\mathcal{A})$ of real valued $\mathcal{A}$-measurable functions defined over a measurable space $(X,\mathcal{A})$ is called a $\chi$-ring if for each $E\in \mathcal{A} $, the characteristic function $\chi_{E}\in S(X,\mathcal{A})$. The set $\mathcal{U}_X$ of all $\mathcal{A}$-ultrafilters on $X$ with the Stone topology $\tau$ is seen to be homeomorphic to an appropriate quotient space of the set $\mathcal{M}_X$ of all maximal ideals in $S(X,\mathcal{A})$ equipped with the hull-kernel topology $\tau_S$. It is realized that $(\mathcal{U}_X,\tau)$ is homeomorphic to $(\mathcal{M}_S,\tau_S)$ if and only if $S(X,\mathcal{A})$ is a Gelfand ring. It is further observed that $S(X,\mathcal{A})$ is a Von-Neumann regular ring if and only if each ideal in this ring is a $\mathcal{Z}_S$-ideal and $S(X,\mathcal{A})$ is Gelfand when and only when every maximal ideal in it is a $\mathcal{Z}_S$-ideal. A pair of topologies $u_\mu$-topology and $m_\mu$-topology, are introduced on the set $S(X,\mathcal{A})$ and a few properties are studied.
item.dc:creator: Soumajit Dey, Sudip Kumar Acharyya, Dhananjoy Mandal

item.title: Quasisymmetric minimality on packing dimension for homogeneous perfect sets
item.description: arXiv:2407.20562v2 Announce Type: replace Abstract: In this paper, we study the quasisymmetric packing minimality of homogeneous perfect sets, and obtain that a special class of homogeneous perfect sets with $\operatorname{dim}_{P}E=1$ is quasisymmetrically packing minimal.
item.dc:creator: Shishuang Liu, Yanzhe Li, Jiaojiao Yang
